content.raw:
issue #1833

disabling sounds like a good idea for now. the test is already disabled for simbody; we should do it for dart too. currently gazebo crashes with those physics engines when loading a nested model.
content.html:
issue #1833

disabling sounds like a good idea for now. the test is already disabled for simbody; we should do it for dart too. currently gazebo crashes with those physics engines when loading a nested model.

content.raw: ok I see, I haven't really tested nested models much with physics engines other than ode and bullet. We should just disable loading nested models in simbody and dart?
content.html: ok I see, I haven't really tested nested models much with physics engines other than ode and bullet. We should just disable loading nested models in simbody and dart?

content.raw:
it actually appears to be a problem with nested models in dart; I'll post details in an issue

To reproduce, open the `nested_model.world` in the `worlds` folder. You can open it paused, but once you unpause it will crash.

~~~
gazebo --verbose -u -e dart worlds/nested_model.world
~~~
content.html:
it actually appears to be a problem with nested models in dart; I'll post details in an issue

To reproduce, open the nested_model.world in the worlds folder. You can open it paused, but once you unpause it will crash.

gazebo --verbose -u -e dart worlds/nested_model.world

content.raw: I've been seeing an `INTEGRATION_world_reset` test failure with dart since this was merged. I'll post more shortly
content.html: I've been seeing an INTEGRATION_world_reset test failure with dart since this was merged. I'll post more shortly

update.description:
This is needed by the FTU tutorial. The plugin is for demonstrations purposes and makes a couple of assumptions: The parent model needs to have differential drive capability and a forward looking depth camera sensor

The plugin finds closest object using depth camera sensor and sets the velocities of the joints to move towards the direction of the object

see [pull request #180](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-requests/180/add-follower-vehicle-model/diff) in the gazebo_models repo for the accompanying follower vehicle model that uses this plugin

thanks to @caguero for the help on this plugin
update.title: Add FollowerPlugin for FTU tutorial
